sentences.sContent: Children in single-parent families must not be stigmatized.
sentences.sCn: 单亲家庭的孩子不应该受到侮辱。

words.tran: 有烙印的；丑恶的；不名誉的；气孔的；小红斑的
[植] 柱头；耻辱；污名；烙印；特征

trans.tranOther: If someone or something is stigmatized, they are unfairly regarded by many people as being bad or having something to be ashamed of
